# Data Import

```{r Import}

T1 <- Sys.time()

USGRP <- 
  fRead_and_Union(
    pType    = "B", 
    pTable   = "USGRP")

USGRPT <- 
  fRead_and_Union(
    pType    = "B", 
    pTable   = "USGRPT", 
    pOptions = list("SPRSL = 'E'"))

USGRP_USER <-
  fRead_and_Union(
    pType    = "B", 
    pTable   = "USGRP_USER",
    pFields  = list("BNAME", "USERGROUP"))

USR <- fGetSAPUsers(pType = "B")

AGR_USERS <- 
  fRead_and_Union(
    pType    = "B", 
    pTable   = "AGR_USERS",
    pFields  = list("AGR_NAME", "UNAME", "TO_DAT"))

# AGR_DEFINE

# Query & Object Authorization
AUTH       <-
  fRead_and_Union(
    pSIDCLNT = c("BU1300", "BA1300", "BP1300"),
    pTable   = "/BIC/AG1AAPD222",
    pOptions = list(),
    pFields  = list(
      '/BIC/G1AAGRP' , '/BIC/G1AAOBJ'  , '/BIC/G1AAOPT'  , 
      '/BIC/G1AASIGN', '/BIC/G1AAVAL_H', '/BIC/G1AAVAL_L', 
      '/BIC/G1COUNT' , 'RECORDMODE'))                       %T>%
  setnames(gsub("/BIC/", "", names(.)))

Sys.time() - T1
```

# Transform

```{r Transform}

dtUSR_lng <- 
  copy(USR)  

dtUSR_wid <- 
  dcast.data.table(
    data    = dtUSR_lng,
    formula = BNAME 
    + USTYP + CLASS + TRDAT + USR_GLTGB  + UFLAG
    ~ SYSTID,
    fun.aggregate = length,
    value.var = "SYSTID")                    %>%  
  .[, Total := BS1 + BD1 + BU1 + BA1 + BP1]        %T>%
  setcolorder(
    c("BNAME", "USTYP", "CLASS", "TRDAT", "USR_GLTGB", "UFLAG",
      "BS1"  , "BD1"  , "BU1"  , "BA1"  , "BP1"      , "Total"))

dtUSR_GRP <- 
  copy(USGRP_USER)

dtUSR_AGR <- 
  copy(AGR_USERS)          %T>%
  setnames(c("TO_DAT"), 
           c("AGR_TO_DAT"))

dtAUTH <- 
  dtUSR_lng                                            %>%
  dtUSR_AGR[., on = .(SYSTID, CLIENT, UNAME = BNAME)]  %>%
  dtUSR_GRP[., on = .(SYSTID, CLIENT, BNAME = UNAME), 
            allow.cartesian = TRUE]

dtRES <- USR02[AGR_USERS, on = .(SYSTID, BNAME = UNAME )]

```

# Model

```{r Model}
dtLOCK <- 
  copy(USR)             %>%
  .[USTYP     == "A"     &
    USR_GLTGB  > today() &
    SYSTID    == "BP1"   & 
    LDAYS     >= 100     & 
    USTATE == "VALID"    ]

```
